Description of incident: Employees were able to access the pay stub information of other employees at shared workstations.  Any UMass Memorial employee who accessed their HRConnect by using one of the 10 malfunctioning kiosks or shared workstations between October 7 and March 11, 2011 may have been affected.  The problem was fixed as of March 16.  Employees were able to access the names, bank names, bank transit numbers and bank account numbers of previous employees who had used the kiosks to connect to HRConnect. The portion of the 13,500 employees who were affected is unknown.
